19:24 <rauds> Hi, I updated 5.0 to 5.01 and I can't activate the activety stream. The field is just plain white without content. Do I need to reinstall the paket? What else can i do. Perhaps I deselected a xar document? But i upgraded to 5.0.2 with deselecting the main documents, which areexplained on the upgrade page. The activity stream is still empty.  
19:42 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
19:55 <vmassol> has quit  
19:56 <sdumitriu> Hi rauds  
19:57 <sdumitriu> Well, the activity stream is only going to display something if there is activity  
19:57 <sdumitriu> Try to change a document  
19:57 <sdumitriu> Also, after an upgrade previous activity is going to be hidden, that's kind of a bug  
20:24 <rauds> Hi Sergiu, Thank you for the tip. I tried it with a new blog and changes in a space. The stream is still blank. Can i restart/reinstall the modul manual? I can't find it in the extensions.  
20:25 <rauds> Can i find somwhere a status about extensions?  
20:28 <rauds> I found the XWiki Platform - Activity Stream - UI in the installed extensions. WIll it help to reinstall it?  
20:42 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki
